span.p: Key Club offers homework help online Wednesday evenings.

a.title: Go to comments for Key Club offers homework help

span.p: Message from the Principal about the closure and E-learning -please read.

a.title: Go to comments for E-learning message

span.p: Students - please check your school e-mail daily starting Monday March 16 for e-Learning. You do not need to check it during our official Spring Break March 21-29. In order to help facilitate e-Learning, Comcast is offering free Internet to those who need it.

a.title: Go to comments for Free Internet

div.p: Please review the revised online AP exam schedule linked below. The new AP exam window is now May 11 May 22. Check with your AP teacher(s) regarding questions about the exams. Make sure you check your tech connections and reach out if you have any issues. If you have further questions and concerns, please contact Mrs. Schulzki, AP exam coordinator, ann.schulzki@d11.org.
https://apcoronavirusupdates.collegeboard.org/students - everything you need to know about online AP exams

a.title: Go to comments for online AP exams
